1.name: eCommerce
1.content: MERN eCommerce application to build and buy or upgrade your gaming setup.

3.name: Crypto-World
3.content: A React-fullstack platform to track all cryptocurrency in one place. See their price, latest news, volume, market cap and past data represented by graphs.

5.content: Notes App which stores data to LocalStorage and includes Firebase Auth, using HTML, CSS, JS.
